__e: Are you sure Hope did it?
My dad can't have a problem with his parents meeting Hope if she has a mother.
Hope said you wanted to talk to me, said it was important.
One for Hope, one for Hope's boyfriend, and one for the girl who tried to kill my daughter.
And that you are constantly asking yourself why he took Hope instead of you?
Hope and I, we're... we're just... we don't know how to do this whole mother/daughter thing.
Looks like Hope's the star, and you're number two.
Oh, I'm glad Hope had a good time.
You can't kill him with Hope still in jail.
